message.name: ERR_PRODPROVISION_DRE_CURRENT_END_DATE
message.locale: The same provider provides this product after date %1d. Please set End Date of current product provision not later than %2d.

message.name: ERR_PRODPROVISION_DRE_DATES
message.locale: Product provision for the same product and provider exist in specified period.

message.name: ERR_PRODPROVISION_DRE_PREVIOUS_END_DATE
message.locale: Another product provision with the same provider and product is still active. Please set end date of previously defined product provision less than current Start Date.

message.name: ERR_PRODPROVISION_MRE_PERIOD
message.locale: This provider is already providing this product for the period that you have specified.

message.name: ERR_PRODPROVISION_XRV_REMOVE
message.locale: Provider assignment cannot be removed from product because it is still provided at location(s).

message.name: ERR_PRODPROVISION_XRV_PROVIDER_REG_START_DATE
message.locale: The provider's registration date must not be later than the start date of any of its product provisions

message.name: ERR_PRODPROVISION_XRV_PROVIDER_END_END_DATE
message.locale: The provider's end date must not be earlier than the end date of any of its product provisions
